description: Archives the currently active board by switching its status to archived and stamping the archive timestamp. Because only one board can be active at a time, no parameters are required.

instructions.value: UPDATE boards SET status = 'archived', archived_at = NOW(), updated_at = NOW() , created_at =
WHERE status = 'active' RETURNING id, name, status, archived_at, created_at, updated_at
